description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In Figment you play as a child's action figures who have come to life in order to save a boy from dark forces. Toys that have turned into monsters!  Play as one of two characters, or both in co-op as you battle through hordes of evil figurines and mutated play things to save your human in this beat 'em up style action adventure!
